item.def: rakkhabyāpāliṅgapihāgate tittisāmatthyapavesasattāsavanapatthane icchoppade vuddhigāhakaraṇāvagame vadhe pītisobhāsvityekūnavīsatyatthesu
gatyajjhayanicichāsu saddahane ca (ye gatyatthā te buddhyatthā, pavattipāpuṇatthakā)
caye (u vaḍḍhane, apa bhindane, ni o che, saṃ u samuccaye)
caye (u vaḍḍhane, apa bhindane, ni o che, saṃ u samuccaye)
caye (u vaḍḍhane, apa bhindane, ni o che, saṃ u samuccaye)
caye (u vaḍḍhane, apa bhindane, ni o che, saṃ u samuccaye)
saññicchāyaṃ sandīpane ca pīṇane, acchedasantahiṃsātakke ca
dānasodhanasuddhachedarakkhapalāyane upatāpe ca (āpubbo ādāne, ni soppane)
dhāradānaposane (ni syāse [sy. nyāse], vi karaṇe, ā ārope, abhi bhāsane, saṃ saddahanasandhīsu, api acchādane, pari nivāse, ava savane, antaro cu adassane)
sattāpattivuddhyanubhāvesu pāpuṇe ca (vi chijjane, pari hiṃsāhiḷe, parā byāsane, abhi adhi maddane, anu sattinubhavane, pa sattisandanissare)
anukammappakāsalābhacintāsu missane suddhiyañca (pari vāsite, vi vibhāvane, saṃ thutyaṃ)
viratiyaṃ (ā dīghībhāve, ni nicchayavatesu, u vāyāme, saṃ indriyaniggahe)
vākye (vi vilāpe, pa anatthake, ā āmante, saṃ sallāpe, apo aññathāvace, anu muhuṃvākye, u vikatthane)
patte (ā ghātaphasse, vi pa visaṃvade, upā nindāpubbaduṭṭhavācāya)
pihāyaṃ silesadittikīḷāsu ca (u hāse, vi vilāsane)
lābhasiñcanasaṅgesu (saṃ saṃsagge, ni vi u cāge)
sādagate visādapātahiṃsanapītisu ca (ni nisīdane, pa nimmale, upa nikaṭe)
byākule takkasaddāloce ca (ni dassanassute, pati saṃ patisāmamhi)
sevagativuddhyaṃ (u ussaye, ā ni apa āva avalambamhi)
hiṃsāgatyaṃ (u ugghāte, saṃ saṃhate, ā āghāte)
hāre (pa pahāre, saṃ saṃhāre, vi ā vace, apa dūrīkaraṇe, vi vihāre, ā āhare, pari niccabhoge, upa pūjāyaṃ, ni nikaḍḍhane)
